member.name: T:MultiPurpose.AutoGenerate
member.summary: A class that auto-generates text. Made static to get direct contact with the functions.

member.name: M:MultiPurpose.AutoGenerate.printNumericText(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Forwards the values, wether to be increased one-by-one or increased by a jump value

member.name: M:MultiPurpose.AutoGenerate.printTextOnly(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns (end - start) number of lines. Only 'text' is returned and generated X times.

member.name: M:MultiPurpose.AutoGenerate.printNumericStartEnd(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Prints the starttext, the number (from start to end) and then the endText Adds a newline at the end of each line
member.param: The text to be added at the end

member.name: M:MultiPurpose.AutoGenerate.printTextStartEnd(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Prints the startText and endText Adds a newline at the end of each line
member.param: The text to be added at the end
